nodes.text: The NB200 Commercial Lift was a turbolift model for sale during the Galactic Civil War. It could fit at least one Human adult and was available for purchasing. The model was considered as an option by the Galactic Empire during the construction of the DS-1 Orbital Battle Station for replacing the Death Star's slower default lift tube. It was slower than the Insta-Lift 2000 SE, the Ultra-Lift 3000 Extreme and the Infini-lift Lightspeed models.
